meanings.definition: To surpass in excellence or quality.
meanings.sent1: The talented musician outclasses all others in the band.
meanings.sent2: Her painting outclasses the rest in the art show.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel outclasses the others in nut-gathering skills.
meanings.sent4: His determination outclasses any obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent5: The bright star outclasses all others in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To be superior to in a particular aspect or skill.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah outclasses all other animals in speed.
meanings.sent2: Her intelligence outclasses her classmates in math.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant outclasses the others in carrying heavy loads.
meanings.sent4: His leadership outclasses that of any other team member.
meanings.sent5: The champion boxer outclasses his opponent in every round.
